QuestData.Title: Not On My Watch!
QuestData.Description: The battle plans were written up by an ogre lieutenant. His name is either Dump or Lump.$B$B<Bintook turns the parchment sideways and cocks her head.>$B$BIt could also be Billy.$B$BAnyhow, I think you should go back out there and have a word with Billy or Lump or Dumpy or whatever! Try to approach him diplomatically. If that doesn't work, try using some muscle.
QuestData.LogDescription: Huntress Bintook at Telaar in Nagrand wants you to speak to Lump. Return to Huntress Bintook when you have gathered the information that she requested.
QuestData.CompletionText: He'll probably be asleep on a ridge.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh my! This is a small scouting and hunting party? You must tell Mo'mor what you have discovered.
